name: OnnxMacCUnofficial
summary: Experimental wrapper around the C API of the Onnx Runtime.
description:
Experimental wrapper around the C API of the Onnx Runtime.
Universal macOS binary sourced from dylib and headers at https://github.com/microsoft/onnxruntime/releases.
Link obtained from ONNX homepage by choosing Mac -> Arm64 -> C++.
C++ headers then manually removed.
